mapper.insert: create table ${username}_PRODUCT ( productnum varchar2(50) primary key not null, productname varchar2(200) not null, wishcount number default 0, totalprice number not null, productcount number not null, sellcount number default 0 not null, imagecount number default 0 not null, content varchar2(4000) not null, readcount number default 0 not null, startdate date default sysdate not null, enddate date, optionstatus number)

insert into ${username}PRODUCT (productnum, productname, totalprice, productcount, content, startdate, enddate, optionstatus) values( TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY') || LPAD(${username}product_seq.nextval, 5, '0')), #{productname}, #{totalprice}, #{productcount}, #{content}, sysdate, #{enddate}, #{optionstatus} )
